p: The sesame plant has been considered as a gift of nature. Sesame root contains chlorosesamone which attributes to its antifungal action [ 8]. Sesame oil is rich in polyunsaturated fatty acids which can lessen free radical injury happening in the oral cavity [ 11]. Sesame oil is a rich source of sesamin, sesamolin, and sesaminol which play a vital role in detoxification. It has antioxidant and antibiotic activities and also deters lipid peroxidation [ 12].
